text: Soulce was a municipality of the district of Del√©mont in the canton of Jura in Switzerland. On 1 January 2013, the former municipalities of Soulce, Bassecourt, Courfaivre, Glovelier and Undervelier merged into the new municipality of Haute-Sorne. ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Jura Category:2013 disestablishments in Switzerland
title: Soulce
